ygData.subject: Re: Targetting Mobs
ygData.msgSnippet: Try remaping the attack key to something even more usuless, like the `/~ key or the + key on the VERY FAR right of the keyboard.  I have found if I mistype I
ygData.messageBody:
Try remaping the attack key to something even more usuless, like the `/~ key
or the + key on the VERY FAR right of the keyboard. I have found if I
mistype I usually hit the key too far inside rather then outside, and have
fewer deaths for poor typing.

kim@... wrote:

> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 15 Sep 1999, JasonF wrote:
> >
> > Now, with that said, I'm coming to regret my decision to
> > map the most commonly used letter in the English alphabet
> > (E) to be my attack key. I have to be extremely cautious
> > when conversing with NPCs that I have the text entry
> > window up before blasting out a string of text. Many
>
> I remapped mine to caps lock. Aside from EQ, I don't think I
> ever use that key.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
